Interface Locks<K, L extends Lock>

Type Parameters:
K - type of key
L - type of Lock
All Known Implementing Classes:
ReentrantLocks
public interface Locks<K, L extends Lock>
Key-based locking with implementations of Lock.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    L
    get(K key)
    Returns a lock for the supplied key.
    L
    lock(K key)
    Return a Lock already locked using Lock.lock().
    static <K> ReentrantLocks<K>
    reentrant()
    Return a ReentrantLocks instance using ReentrantLock.
    static <K> ReentrantLocks<K>
    reentrant(boolean fair)
    Return a ReentrantLocks instance using ReentrantLock with the given fairness policy.
    static <K> ReentrantLocks<K>
    reentrant(boolean fair, Class<K> keyClass)
    Return a ReentrantLocks instance using ReentrantLock with the given fairness policy.
    static <K> ReentrantLocks<K>
    reentrant(Class<K> keyClass)
    Return a ReentrantLocks instance using ReentrantLock.
    int
    size()
    Returns the current number of locks managed by this instance.
    static <K, L extends Lock>
    Locks<K,L>
    withSupplier(Supplier<L> lockSupplier)
    Return an instance using Lock implementations created by the specified lockSupplier.

  • Method Details

    • withSupplier

      static <K, L extends Lock> Locks<K,L> withSupplier(Supplier<L> lockSupplier)
      Return an instance using Lock implementations created by the specified lockSupplier.
      Type Parameters:
      K - type of key
      L - type of Lock
      Parameters:
      lockSupplier - Supplier for instances of L (usually the constructor of a class implementing Lock)
      Returns:
      instance using Lock implementations created by the specified lockSupplier

    • reentrant

      static <K> ReentrantLocks<K> reentrant()
      Return a ReentrantLocks instance using ReentrantLock.
      Type Parameters:
      K - type of key
      Returns:
      ReentrantLocks instance

    • reentrant

      static <K> ReentrantLocks<K> reentrant(Class<K> keyClass)
      Return a ReentrantLocks instance using ReentrantLock.
      Type Parameters:
      K - type of key
      Parameters:
      keyClass - class of key
      Returns:
      ReentrantLocks instance

    • reentrant

      static <K> ReentrantLocks<K> reentrant(boolean fair)
      Return a ReentrantLocks instance using ReentrantLock with the given fairness policy.
      Type Parameters:
      K - type of key
      Parameters:
      fair - true if the locks should use a fair ordering policy (see ReentrantLock(boolean))
      Returns:
      ReentrantLocks instance
      Since:
      1.2.0

    • reentrant

      static <K> ReentrantLocks<K> reentrant(boolean fair, Class<K> keyClass)
      Return a ReentrantLocks instance using ReentrantLock with the given fairness policy.
      Type Parameters:
      K - type of key
      Parameters:
      fair - true if the locks should use a fair ordering policy (see ReentrantLock(boolean))
      keyClass - class of key
      Returns:
      ReentrantLocks instance
      Since:
      1.2.0

    • get

      L get(K key)
      Returns a lock for the supplied key. There will be at most one lock per key at any given time.
      Parameters:
      key - key
      Returns:
      lock

    • lock

      L lock(K key)
      Return a Lock already locked using Lock.lock().
      Parameters:
      key - key
      Returns:
      already locked lock

    • size

      int size()
      Returns the current number of locks managed by this instance.
      Returns:
      number of locks
